name: Deena Purushothaman
text:
I've had 3 successfull visas done by them so far, and I Got my latest UK visa approved within a few days of submitting. My documents were prepared and uploaded perfectly. They have a great team and patiently handled all my queries. I was hand held throughout the entire process and even though we had to submit more than 50 documents, the process did not feel hard because they guided me through everything.

 I'm more than happy to use them for any other visa in the future. Anusha and her full team and (Vidya, my consultant) were very cooperative.

I had the smoothest experience and would recommend their services in the blink of an eye.

text: Visa experts and absolute professionals. Handled my UK visa without a glitch, and I got my visa approved within few days of applying. I will always be using them for any visa processing in the future. Anusha and the complete team are just excellent!

text: A big thanks to Anusha and her team for helping me for acquiring my Schengen Visa.! They really helped me in collecting and preparing all the required documents for the visa application. name: Rachita M
text: Dear Anusha and Team,  I want to express my deepest gratitude for the incredible support and guidance you provided throughout our immigration journey to Australia.    This process came with its fair share of challenges ‚Äî especially during the uncertainty of the COVID pandemic. With border closures, extended time lines, and the need to revisit paperwork multiple time's, it often felt overwhelming. But your unwavering support, patience, and professionalism helped us navigate every step with confidence and hope.    Through all the ups and downs, your team remained a constant source of reassurance. You didn' t just help with paperwork and procedures ‚Äî you stood by us, encouraged us, and ultimately made our dream come true.    Thank you for being such a vital part of this life-changing journey. We will always be grateful.

text: Thank you global visa ,your services are awesome,I obtained visa hassle free because of your services.I would recommend everyone Global visa any time.

text:

name: Karthik Prabhakaran
text:
I got in touch with Global Visa to assist with my in-laws' tourist visa application for Switzerland, and I couldn't be happier with their service! From the very beginning, the team was extremely professional, knowledgeable, and supportive throughout the entire visa process. They patiently guided us through all the documentation requirements, ensuring everything was accurate and complete, which made the entire application process smooth and stress-free.  

  What impressed me even more was their continued support even after the visa was approved. Due to some unforeseen changes in our travel plans, we needed to modify the travel insurance dates. The team handled this promptly and efficiently, ensuring everything was updated without any hassle.  

  Their dedication, attention to detail, and excellent customer service truly made a difference. I highly recommend Global Visa to anyone looking for reliable and professional assistance for visa processing and travel-related support. Thank you for making this experience so easy and positive for our family!

name: vimal khumar
text:
I was referred to Global Visa Internationals in Bangalore by a friend who had a successful visa experience with them after a couple of initial rejections. From the very beginning, the team was approachable and clearly explained all the requirements‚Äîright from financial documentation to the necessary paperwork.  

  Vidya, who handled my case, was extremely patient, always listened carefully, and sought second opinions from Anusha whenever there was a doubt. This gave me a lot of confidence throughout the process, especially since my family had faced a couple of visa rejections before.  

  Vidya managed the entire process smoothly and took care of almost all the documentation, only asking me for a few mandatory documents. Thanks to the professionalism and support from the team, my family finally got their visa approved.  

  A big thanks to Global Visa Internationals‚Äîand a special mention to Vidya for her dedication and support!
reply: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience! We're truly delighted to hear that Vidya and Anusha were able to support you and your family through the visa process with care and professionalism. Helping clients overcome past rejections and succeed brings us immense satisfaction. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to Vidya ‚Äì she' ll be thrilled! üòä Wishing you and your family all the best on your travels, and we' re always here if you need us again! ‚ú®üåè

name: Harish S
text:
I recently had the pleasure of utilizing the services of Global Visa Internationals for my US B1/B2 visa application process for my mother and me, and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed. From start to finish, their team especially Bharathi, led by Anusha, provided exceptional support and guidance.

Anusha, the visa consultant assigned to my case, was incredibly knowledgeable and attentive. She patiently walked me through the entire process, ensuring that I understood each step and requirement for my visa interview. Her professionalism and expertise instilled confidence in me, making what could have been a daunting experience much more manageable.

 One aspect that stood out to me was the level of personalized attention I received. Despite the company likely handling multiple applicants simultaneously, Anusha made me feel like a priority, promptly responding to any questions or concerns I had along the way. This dedication to customer service is commendable and greatly appreciated.

 Additionally, Global Visa Internationals streamlined process for scheduling appointments on priority and preparing for the interview was invaluable. They provided comprehensive guidance on gathering necessary documents, preparing for potential interview questions,mock interviews, and ensuring all paperwork was in order. Thanks to their thorough assistance, I felt fully prepared and confident

 Overall, my experience with Global Visa International was exceptional. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and commitment to customer satisfaction truly set them apart. I wholeheartedly recommend their services to anyone in need of visa assistance. Anusha and the team at Global Visa International have exceeded my expectations, and I am grateful for their support throughout this process.

Thanks teams for the guidance and support.üòÅ
reply:
Dear Harish
Congratulations on your USA Visa Grant!!

We' re really grateful and appreciate you for taking the time to share your rating with us!! We sincerely appreciate your business and your valuable feedback. Your satisfaction is what drives us, and we can' t wait to welcome you back for another outstanding experience.

We are so happy that we could stand on your expectations

Bon Voyage!!

name: Santosh
text:
Dear all,
 I am sharing my experience with global visa internationals. Right from start after payment of fees I was given a list of documents. Very diligently I arranged all of them and handed over to vidya. We had a few sittings before we could finally submit our application.  Best thing is they double ensure for all right documents. Then me and my daughter who is appearing for PLAB2 exam in UK gave our visa interview on 04 Mar and by 12 Mar2024 the stamped passport with UK visa was delivered to me. Though I had not opted for FastTrack still it was received just in a week. So, it means our documents were in order. All thanks to Anusha and her team. Keep up the good work and best part  it's a strong women's team. Please utilise their services if you want your documents submission error free.

name: Anand Ram.S
text:
First and foremost, I would like to commend Global visa consultants and Anusha for their in-depth knowledge of the UK visa requirements and regulations. Their guidance throughout the application process was invaluable, ensuring that all necessary documents were submitted accurately and on time. This level of expertise instilled confidence in us and made the process significantly less daunting.

Furthermore, the personalised approach taken by Soni deserves special recognition. She took the time to understand our specific situation and provided tailored advice accordingly. This individualized attention made us feel valued as clients and helped streamline the application process.

In terms of areas for improvement, I have a few suggestions that I believe could further enhance the overall experience for future clients:

Enhanced Communication: While your consultants were generally responsive, improving communication channels such as offering a dedicated client portal or mobile app for updates and queries could further streamline communication and provide real-time status updates.

Transparency in Fees: Providing a detailed breakdown of fees and any potential additional costs upfront would help clients better understand the financial aspect of the visa application process from the outset.

Expanded Resources: Offering additional resources such as informational webinars or FAQ guides tailored specifically to UK Dependent Visa applicants could further empower clients and alleviate any uncertainties they may have.

 Despite these minor suggestions, please know that our overall experience with your consultancy was extremely positive, and we are grateful for your assistance every step of the way.

I want to extend my best wishes for continued success to your team. Your dedication to excellence sets a benchmark in the industry, and I have no doubt that you will continue to thrive in providing exceptional service to your clients.
reply:
Dear Anand
Congratulations on your UK Skilled worker - Partner Visa Grant!!

And your suggestions are highly appreciated, will upgrade our services shortly

We‚Äôre really grateful and appreciate you taking the time to share your rating with us!! We sincerely appreciate your business and your valuable feedback. Your satisfaction is what drives us, and we can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back for another outstanding experience.

We are so happy that we could stand on your expectations

Bon Voyage!!

Regards
Team Global Visa Internationals
